author: Frances Martel
title: Wuhan Reopens Subway Despite Reports of Ongoing Coronavirus Infections
description: Wuhan, the city of 11 million people where the Chinese coronavirus originated, reopened much of its public transport this weekend, including its subway system, despite widespread reports that the Communist Party is hiding the continued spread of the virus the…
